name: arrayMap
description: Iterates over every entry of the array and calls the closure function to work on the element of the array. The returned value will be set at the same index in a new array and the new array will be returned

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration.

callback_params.description: The value for the current iteration
callback_params.name: value

callback_params.description: The current index for the iteration
callback_params.name: index

callback_params.description: A reference of the original array
callback_params.name: array

params.name: parallel
params.description: Lucee4.5+ true if the items can be executed in parallel

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: Lucee4.5+ the maximum number of threads to use when parallel = true
